attributes.action: Make British Day a bank holiday to celebrate British-ness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make British Day a bank holiday to celebrate British-ness.  The only way to bring people together is by having such a day. The 4th July makes all Americans join as one, let us do the same. We should be proud of our heritage and anyone else who joins us here should be proud too. Just one day a year where we wave the flag with pride. We love Britain!
